verbose_text: To validate the loss of interaction between FAM161A and variant POC1B in mammalian cells, we cotransfected hTERT-RPE1 cells with constructs encoding wild-type and variant mRFP-POC1B together with PalmMyr-CFP-FAM161A (XREF_FIG B-5D; Figures S7A-S7C).
evidence: loss of interaction between FAM161A and variant POC1B
